org.tapchain.editor

Class TapChainEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tapchain.editor.TapChainEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChainController.IControlCallback, ILogHandler, IActorEditor, IEditor<Actor,IActorTap>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TapChainAndroidEditor

    public abstract class TapChainEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChainController.IControlCallback, ILogHandler, IActorEditor
    TapChainEditor is a model for TapChain. TapChainEditor contains actor blueprints (Factory), style for tap instantiation and ActorManager for editing actors and taps.

        public ActorManager edit()
        Description copied from interface: IEditor
        Get a manager for editing actor and actor tap. For adding or removing actor, this is the first step. And when you add actor by this return, actor tap will be added automatically by instantiating tap blueprint style that you set.
